original_title: Vestigios en super-8: una crónica amateur de los años del cambio
overview: Super-8 filming, made between 1976 and 1979, from the amateur drive to capture the moment. For the professors of the University Carlos III Elena Oroz and Xose Prieto Souso, who have directed the project, the vestiges of the collective struggles, social rituals and family moments from the articles that articulate an archeology of the possible attentive to the textures affective, aesthetic and temporary inscribed in them.
title: Vestigios en super-8: una crónica amateur de los años del cambio
